Post: "I'm feeling so sick lately, must be because I have a weak immune system. Maybe it's because I don't take care of myself enough or maybe I'm just prone to getting sick. Either way, it's frustrating and demotivating."
"Feeling completely wiped out today. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: I am non-functional and unproductive at work.
Post: "I'm so unproductive and non-functional at work lately. It's like my brain just decided to take a permanent vacation. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this job, or maybe I'm just inherently lazy. Either way, it's clear that I'm never going to amount to anything in my career."

Event: My brand new phone keeps switching itself off.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even keep my phone on for more than five minutes without it mysteriously shutting down. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to make my life more difficult."

Event: Working at night and missing out on good weather.
Post: "Missing out on yet another beautiful day because I'm stuck working night shifts. Must be my fate to forever be a slave to the clock."

Post: "Feeling weak and tired while studying for a long quiz because I'm not cut out for this whole college thing."
"Feeling dizzy and lightheaded all the time lately. Must be due to my poor circulation and lack of physical fitness."

Sure, I understand the definition of Internal Attributional Style (IAS) and how it refers to attributing causes of events or behaviors to one's internal characteristics such as personality traits, abilities, motivation, or emotions. I am ready to generate a social media post using the IAS format based on the event you provide.

Please go ahead and provide the event for which you want me to generate an IAS post.
"I can't believe I'm still coughing after all these years of smoking. Guess it's just another sign that I'm a hopeless case when it comes to taking care of myself."

Post: "Feeling like a total disappointment to my family. My dad won't even let me go out unless I find someone to tag along. Guess I'm just not worthy of going solo."
"Feeling down lately because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Post: "I'm being forced to attend science practical against my will, just because school is important and I can't waste my parents' money. It's like, I get it, education is vital and all that jazz, but can't I just have a say in what I want to do with my life? #FeelingTrapped #NotMyChoice #ScienceSucks"

Post: "I'm so tired of being lazy and choosing sleep over gym almost every day. It's like my body is just not meant to be fit. #fail"
